``` r
geno <- read.table("rs8067378_ENSG00000172057.6.txt")
sum <- summary(geno)
```

``` r
table(geno$geno)
```

    ## A/A A/G G/G 
    ## 108 233 121

inds <- (geno$geno=="G/G")
geno[inds,]$exp
